external_games.name: Onizuka Katsuya Super Virtual Boxing: Shin Kentou-ou Densetsu

name: Onizuka Katsuya Super Virtual Boxing: Shin Kentou-ou Densetsu
summary: Onizuka Katsuya Super Virtual Boxing ~Shin Kentou Ou Densetsu~ is a boxing video game, developed by Sting Entertainment and published by SOFEL, which was released exclusively in Japan in 1993. It was licensed and endorsed by Katsuya Onizuka, a former WBA Super Flyweight champion.
